(:37) 12-T.Brady kneels to NE 21 for -1 yards. NE-12 Bradyâs 18th career postseason win, extends his NFL record. Bill Belichick 19th career postseason win, ties Don Shula for 2nd-most by head coach in NFL history (Tom Landry 20).
